title: Which music software pro music producers use for making music? - Quora

response.answer_text: A lot music producers use pro tools, logic, reason, mpc, ableton, and native instruments. There are plenty of others as well but those are some of the most well known ones. Also I wouldn’t focus so much on what the pro’s use, a pro can use anything. I would focus on finding what resonates with you and just practice non stop. Anybody listening to your music won’t care what you used, they just care if it’s good or not. Youtube also has plenty videos on how to use equipment too, that can be very helpful.
